titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a resolution reported by the Committee on Rules providing for the consideration of the conference report on the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 395) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-493.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/21/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of a report from the Committee on Rules providing for the consideration of the conference report on H.J. Res. 395 (continuing appropriations).
